publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-630 Nicola Sturgeon: Scottish Legal Aid Board (Employment of Solicitors to Provide Criminal Legal Assistance) Amendment Regulations 2003-That the Justice 2 Committee recommends that nothing further be done under the Scottish Legal Aid Board (Employment of Solicitors to Provide Criminal Legal Assistance) Amendment Regulations 2003 (SSI 2003/511).
